name: valueList
description:
Returns each value from a column of an executed query.
 CFML does not evaluate the arguments.
 A delimited list of the values of each record returned from an executed query column

params.name: column
params.description: Name of an executed query and column. Separate query name and column name with a period.

params.name: delimiter
params.description:
A delimiter character to separate column data items.
 Default: comma (,).

examples.title: Simple Example
